text:
You can't trust ChatGPT.

So I made it admit "I don't know":

You simply have to add this piece of prompt.

___

Say "I don't know" and why if you don't know.

___

It goes straight to my "must prompt" list with:

✦ Think deeply before answering.
✦ Search the web using [preferred source].
✦ Don't fall into confirmation bias. Try again.
✦ Switch perspective to counterargue yourself.
✦ What's the 20% that yields 80% of the results?

I made an entire course on "How to start with AI".

It's part of my paid Substack at https://lnkd.in/d2BQW-w6.

I also made a list of my free resources & blog archive at https://lnkd.in/dwdzwMTN.
